preface.title: What is Vuizvui?
preface.para: Vuizvui is a set of NixOS modules and machine configurations that aim to extend &nixos; in a way that fits the needs of the members of the &openlab; and also serves as a playground for experimental features that are yet to be included in the official NixOS project once they're well tested and matured enough.
This means that module options in Vuizvui are subject to change without retaining backwards-compatibility for configurations outside of the defined machines.

The name Vuizvui is of Bavarian origins and means something like too much while on the other side nix means nothing. Which fits quite well because this repository is for everything either too complex or not polished/generic enough to be pushed into &nixpkgs;.
